description: Ralph Lauren is proud to partner with Morehouse, a prestigious historically Black college, to introduce a first-of-its-kind collection. Inspired by the rich heritage and esteemed traditions of Morehouse College, this piece is designed with elements that nod to vintage sporting jackets. It is tailored in Italy from an exclusive herringbone fabric that is sourced from a renowned British mill.
fitting_details: Size 40R has a 30" front body length, a 29.5" back body length, an 18.5" shoulder, and a 17.5" sleeve inseam.
Notch lapels. Buttoned throat latch. Buttonhole at the left lapel. Three-button silhouette. Genuine horn buttons. Cuffs with four decorative buttons.
Left chest patch pocket. Two front waist patch pockets. Two interior chest pockets. Interior left waist pocket.
Alterations available in Ralph Lauren retail stores.
Shell: 100% wool. Body lining: 51% cotton, 49% viscose. Sleeve lining: 52% viscose, 48% acetate. Dry clean. Made in Italy.
Model is 6'1" (185 cm) and wears a size 40R.
Please note that due to high demand, each Morehouse Collection style is limited to two per person.
